studyArms.name: Arm A: Prophylaxis
studyArms.description: Participants currently on a prophylaxis treatment regimen with FVIII receive BIVV001 at a dose of 50 IU/kg IV once weekly (QW) for 52 weeks.

studyArms.name: Arm B: On-Demand to Prophylaxis
studyArms.description: Participants currently on an on-demand treatment regimen receive BIVV001 50 IU/kg IV on demand for 26 weeks, then switch to 50 IU/kg IV once weekly (QW) prophylaxis for 26 weeks.

extensionAttributes.valueString: [{'dose': '50 IU/kg on demand', 'startDay': 1, 'endDay': 182, 'description': 'On-demand treatment period'}, {'dose': '50 IU/kg once weekly', 'startDay': 183, 'endDay': 364, 'description': 'Prophylaxis treatment period'}]

studyCohorts.name: Sequential PK Subgroup
studyCohorts.characteristic: 16 participants from Arm A at selected sites undergoing extensive PK sampling at Baseline and Week 26

studyCohorts.name: Surgery Subset
studyCohorts.characteristic: Participants from any arm who undergo major surgery during the study
